attributes.action: change the law on organ donation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make organ donation opt out as opposed to the current opt in. The UK has about 18% donation rate, of which have an 'opt in' approach whilst countries like Sweden, Portugal, France and Austria all have an 'opt out' approach have donation rates between 90-99%. This will decrease organ donor waiting lists to a mere few days compared to months or even years.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to change the law on organ donation.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=organoptout


Her Majesty's Government
